[cms.djangoapp]
translatable_xblocks = translatable_xblocks.apps:TranslatableXBlocksConfig

[lms.djangoapp]
translatable_xblocks = translatable_xblocks.apps:TranslatableXBlocksConfig

[xblock.v1.overrides]
html = translatable_xblocks.xblocks.html_block:HtmlBlock
poll = translatable_xblocks.xblocks.poll_block:PollBlock
problem = translatable_xblocks.xblocks.capa_block:ProblemBlock
video = translatable_xblocks.xblocks.video_block:VideoBlock
